ingredient_list: ['4 cups plain lowfat yogurt', '½ cup milk', 'sugar to taste', '1 tablespoon strawberry flavored milk powder', '1 cup fresh strawberries']
directions_instructions: ['In a bowl, whisk together the yogurt, milk, sugar, and strawberry milk powder. Arrange the strawberries on top, and serve immediately.']
nutrition_summary: ['207 calories; protein 14.1g; carbohydrates 28.1g; fat 4.5g; cholesterol 17.1mg; sodium 186.5mg. Full Nutrition']
